p: Although NADES has been demonstrated to have many superiorities and has a wide application as a new type of solvent, its high viscosity makes its application somewhat inconvenient [ 36, 37]. The viscosity of NADESs could be largely decreased by adding water. In this study, the NADES-2 with the addition of 10%, 15%, 20%, 25%, and 30% (wt%) water were evaluated for the SHS efficiency. Figure 2b showed that the peak areas of the three main components increased slightly by adding 10% to 15% of water. However, when the amount of water was over 15%, the peak areas decreased. It may be attributed to the fact that the hydrogen bonding network in NADES is weakened by adding a large amount of water [ 38]. As a result, the NADES-2 with 15% water content was the better choice.
